option.name: title_text
option.value: Social Media Presentation by Tracey Hill

string_table.name: pxabnsnfns10111110101
string_table.string: Use the w, a, s, and d keys to move around the 360 degree image. Press the tab key to jump to interactive markers and hotspots.

slidelink.displaytext: Social Media Presentation by Tracey Hill
Know who you are interacting with

resource_data.description: Here are some useful links and documents:

resource.title: The Journal of Social Media in Society

terms.term: A group of people you are reaching with digital content.
A small image that represents you on a social network.
A site updated frequently by an individual or group to record opinions or information.
Clickbait is known to encourage users to click on a link to a particular piece of sensationalized information.
Direct messages are real-time text based conversations that occur privately between social media users.
Communicating with other social media users.
Social media network created by Mark Zuckerberg. You can post comments, updates, links, photos, videos, and other interesting web content.
Generic term for a stream of content from other users.
A handle is a public name attached to you when you create your profile on any social media platform.
A hashtag (#) is a way of connecting your posts to similar posts on a topic.
Popular social media application for sharing photos and videos.
Business and employment based social media site for people trying to find a job or internship.
A meme is a funny text, video, or image of a particular concept or situation that is copied and shared by internet users.
Social media network that allows users to share images of products, goods, and services and discover other interests.
A system that manages content (i.e., Wordpress).
Social media is a term used for interactive applications and websites that focuses on communication, content sharing, and other forms of interaction via online media.
A surge in popularity on a particular subject or event.
An online news and social networking site where people communicate in short messages called tweets.
Popular video sharing and social media website owned by Google. Users can upload and share video content with anyone able to access the site.
